01: Live TV.shortDescription: TBS is an American television network owned by Warner Bros. 01: Live TV.title: TBS

01: Live TV.longDescription: TNT is an American basic cable television channel owned by Warner Bros. that launched on October 3, 1988. TNT's original purpose was to air classic films and television series to which Turner Broadcasting maintained spillover rights through its sister station TBS. Since June 2001, the network has shifted its focus to dramatic television series and feature films, along with some sporting events (including NBA, NHL, the NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament and professional wrestling show AEW Rampage), as TBS shifted its focus to comedic programming.
01: Live TV.shortDescription: TNT is an American basic cable television channel owned by Warner Bros. that launched on October 3, 1988. 04: Comedy.longDescription: He's the wrong person, at the wrong place, at the wrong time. Joe Dirt (David Spade) is a janitor with a mullet hairdo, acid-washed jeans and a dream -- to find the parents that he lost at the Grand Canyon when he was eight. As his wandering, misguided search takes him from one misadventure to another, he finds his way to Los Angeles, where a shock-jock (Dennis Miller) brings Joe on the radio to insult him. But as Joe's story unfolds, jeers turn to cheers, and an entire city is captivated.

09: Horror/Thriller.longDescription: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

09: Horror/Thriller.title: Dracula

09: Horror/Thriller.longDescription: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

10: The Lord of the Rings Film Series.title: The Fellowship of the Ring
10: The Lord of the Rings Film Series.shortDescription: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
10: The Lord of the Rings Film Series.longDescription: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

10: The Lord of the Rings Film Series.title: The Two Towers
10: The Lord of the Rings Film Series.shortDescription: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
10: The Lord of the Rings Film Series.longDescription: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

10: The Lord of the Rings Film Series.title: The Return of the King
10: The Lord of the Rings Film Series.shortDescription: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
10: The Lord of the Rings Film Series.longDescription: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

11: Harry Potter Film Series.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
11: Harry Potter Film Series.shortDescription: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.
11: Harry Potter Film Series.longDescription: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

11: Harry Potter Film Series.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
11: Harry Potter Film Series.shortDescription: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.
11: Harry Potter Film Series.longDescription: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.

11: Harry Potter Film Series.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
11: Harry Potter Film Series.shortDescription: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.
